description.p: Strike: Action; Make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)
Shoot: Action; Make a ranged attack with the ranged weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)

Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. The target must make a Constitution saving throw: DC:8 + proficiency bonus + Strength or Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target becomes dazed (dazed: has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws, can't take Reactions and loses the Dexterity bonus to their AC). On a successful save, the target doesn't get dazed. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)
Slash: Action; When wielding double bladed weapon, make a melee attack that hits in a 15 feet horizontal line in front of you. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)

Blast: Action; Blast multiple targets in a cone in front of you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw, DC 8 + proficiency bonus (if applicable) + Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage. (Damage: Weapon Damage and add modifier)

Flame: Action; Flame multiple targets in a cone in front of you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw, DC 8 + proficiency bonus (if applicable) + Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target takes full damage and is inflicted burning for 2 turns. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is inflicted burning for 1 turn. (Damage: Weapon Damage and add modifier)
Off-Hand Strike: Bonus Action; When dual-wielding, make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your off-hand. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)
Quick Shot: Bonus Action; When dual-wielding, make a ranged attack with the ranged weapon in your off-hand. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)
Back Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a double bladed weapon, make a melee attack with the other side of your weapon. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)
Reload: Action; After x amount of shots your weapon needs a reload, take a full Action to fully reload your weapon.

element.name: repair kit: with this you can repair weapons/armours or any technology

description.p: requires repair kit proficiency

element.name: forgery kit: with this kit you can forge documents and make counterfeit credits

description.p: requires forgery kit proficiency

element.name: slicing kit: with this kit you can slice terminals to open locks or disarm traps

description.p: requires slicing kit proficiency

element.name: hacking kit: with this kit you can hack "unconcious" droids or security systems

description.p: requires hacking kit proficieny

element.name: disguise kit: with this kit you can completely change your look

description.p: requires disguise kit proficiency

element.name: poisoning kit: with this kit you can coat your weapons with poisons

description.p: requires poisoning kit proficiency

10d8 + 20 energy, 35 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage
15 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is blinded for 1 round. On a successful save, the target isn't blinded

1d8 cold, 10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage. The explosion creates an icy surface of 10 feet that counts as difficult terrain. Each creature walking over it must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature falls prone. On a successful save, the creature doesn't fall

Each droid must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the droid is stunned for 1 round. On a successful save, the droid isn't stunned

1d6 fire, 10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage and is inflicted burning for 1 turn. On a successful save, the target takes half damage. Sets ground on fire in a 10 feet radius for 3 turns. Each target standing or walking in this will be inflicted burning for 1 turn

description.p: 15 feet line, The target must make a DC 8 + proficiency + Dexterity modifier, Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target is restrained. On a successful save, the target isn't restrained. If the target is restrained he target can on their turn use an Action to do a Strength saving throw against 8 + proficiency + Strength modifier of the restrainer. On a failed save, the targets stays restrained. On a successful save, the target is freed. The Restrainer can't use Bonus Actions or hold something in that hand when restraining someone, Dexterity modifier

The bandfill is a musical instrument, commonly used in jizz, that featured a number of mounted horn bells called reciprocator horns and a ploong sounder
The Chidinkalu horn is a musical instrument made by the Kitonaks from the hollowed-out reeds of a chidinka. It produced low tones and is used in the rhythm section
Drums are a type of percussive musical instrument
The fanfar is a musical instrument commonly used in jizz. Fanfars appeared to be reedy instruments with a mouthpiece, and the slots along the fanfar are known as farra slots
The Dorenian Beshniquel, also known as the Fizzz, is a short, single-reed wind instrument, which is adjusted via peel rod
Flutes are a type of woodwind instrument. One type of flute is the reed flute
The kloo horn is a double-reeded wind instrument, larger than a Slitherhorn and a Fizzz[1] (roughly 1.5 meters tall), and one of the most commonly used instruments in the galaxy
Actions: and one of the most commonly used instruments in the galaxy)
The lute-pipe is a musical instrument that is played by plucking and blowing into it
The mandoviol is a stringed musical instrument, it is a difficult instrument to master, but could be used to play ballads as well as energetic jizz tunes with equal aplomb
The ommni box is a notoriously hard-to-play instrument which enhanced music, and is commonly used in jizz. It is usually used as an amplifier to attenuate and alter the bass aspects of the music
The slitherhorn is a musical instrument common among jizz bands. It is similar in appearance to the kloo horn, though smaller in size
The traz is a musical instrument similar in appearance and sound to the slitherhorn
The valahorn is a type of musical instrument that is similar in appearance and sound to a Kloo horn
The Xantha is a difficult musical instrument that involved plucking strings and covering holes with one's fingers
